page.title: 16HANWOOD VILLAGE SHOP
page.content:
The owners live on the premises and run this small shop with the help of three part time assistants and a team of paper boys. The shop opens 7 days a week. 6.30am -6pm Monday - Saturday and 7am - 1pm Sunday.The shop stocks a wide range of goods from groceries to toys. It is a{newsagent, off licence, {T.V. video library,}agent for shoe repairs, flower arrangements, dry cleaning and photographic printing.
The owner caters for village needs, stocking items that tend to be forgotten during the main shop in Shrewsbury. Thursday is the busiest day when Shrewsbury shops have half day closing. The shop serves a two mile radius. Its situation on the A488 attracts custom from commuter traffic. {A micro computer}has reduced the hours required for book keeping.
